channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warren Buffett gifts us 5 secrets for investing success, as he hands off Berkshire’s reins this week
item.description: Three paragraphs in a 1994 letter to Berkshire Hathaway shareholders reveal the top reason for Buffett’s phenomenal winning record.

item.title: Tesla posts a pessimistic forecast for fourth-quarter sales
item.description: Tesla is expected to sell 1.64 million vehicles in 2025, which is fewer than the 1.79 million it sold in 2024 or they 1.8 million it sold in 2023.

item.title: This trader says AI IPOs and a falling dollar could drive the S&P 500 to 8,200 next year
item.description: Samantha LaDuc has nailed some big calls on stocks in recent years. She sees another S&P 500 high coming in 2026, but an unhappy Main Street.

item.title: Over 6 million Americans on Medicare will now need to get prior authorization from AI for these 17 procedures
item.description: A six-state pilot program will target “wasteful care” under Medicare, Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services says.

item.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: A tech analyst listed his favorite internet stocks for 2026. Here's what he picked
item.description: Mark Mahaney, head of the firm's internet research team, shared his top picks in both the large and small/mid-cap spaces.

item.title: Best and worst asset classes of 2025. Gold wins the year
item.description: Gold is this year's winner while oil and crypto have faced headwinds.

item.title: The risk-reward balance in Broadcom is too good to ignore. How to trade the chipmaker with options
item.description: Nishant Pant breaks down this bull call spread on AVGO.

item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages slid on Monday, with the S&P 500 posting back-to-back losses as investors sold tech names heading into the end of 2025.

item.title: Retail investors have been shying away from 60/40 funds, says JPMorgan. What they're doing instead
item.description: Mom and pop investors seem to be turning away from multi-asset funds and opting for a do-it-yourself approach.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade
item.description: Meta description: Intuitive Machines (LUNR) stock rockets 37% on KeyBanc overweight rating and $20 target amid lunar contract potential. Discover risk...

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost
item.description: Whoa, folks, have you seen what’s happening with Sable Offshore today? This energy player, ticker SOC, is lighting up the charts with one of the bigge...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
